main event: A bright white light approached Columbia Airport at high speed, split into two lights, and ascended silently.
interesting points: The object was described as having a shape similar to an aircraft navigation light., The observation lasted for approximately 8 minutes., Witnesses reported that the object made no noise during its approach and ascent., The event happened around 11:23 Z on 10 Apr 54., The conclusion of the report indicated insufficient data for further evaluation.
sighted object: a bright white light that split into two lights
